column4: Where can I change the default program settings for .rm files from totem to realplayer ? ? ?
right click on the file you want to open, click properties, go to "open with" and select the correct program
easiest way is to do it with a local file (either download or create one) and FF should pick it up
I think gnome's stores the default application list in /etc/gnome/defaults.list, but the right-click open with way is easier...
